title: Goblin Battle Standard
summaries: The Goblin Battle Standard is an event-summoning item that initiates the Goblin Army event when used. This can be useful for farming Spiky Balls or in a world where you need to obtain the Goblin Tinkerer and don't want to wait for the random Goblin Army event. It is also useful in Hardmode for farming Goblin Warlocks and the shadowflame weapons they drop. The Goblin Battle Standard is consumed when used, so one must be crafted for each invasion the player wishes to summon.

The <linked>Tattered Cloth</linked> required for crafting the Goblin Battle Standard is obtained by killing <linked>Goblin Scouts</linked> which spawn occasionally in the East and West thirds of the world.
In order for it to be used, at least one <linked>player</linked> must have 200 <linked>health</linked> or more.
